Package cryptoTrader.app

Class PerformTrades

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.app.PerformTrades
public class PerformTrades
extends java.lang.Object
This is a class that will initiate and execute a trade for a corresponding trading client, strategy and coin names
Author:
Gleb Zvonkov, Dhruv Panicker
